metadata.title: CVE-2018-18459 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - negligible.
metadata.description: The function DCTStream::getBlock in Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication this affects poppler ebarretto> no security impact, crash in CLI tool

criterions.comment: ipe package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
